references.paper_title: Pedestrian head translation, rotation and impact velocity: The influence of vehicle speed, pedestrian speed and pedestrian gait
references.reason: This paper is foundational to understanding pedestrian pre-collision poses and their impact on injury severity in accidents.

references.paper_title: Analysis of pedestrian-to-ground impact injury risk in vehicle-to-pedestrian collisions based on rotation angles
references.reason: This paper provides crucial insights into the biomechanics of pedestrian-vehicle collisions, specifically focusing on the role of pedestrian pose in determining injury risk.

references.paper_title: Pedestrian gaits observed from actual pedestrian-vehicle collisions
references.reason: This study directly addresses the scarcity of real-world data on pedestrian pre-collision poses by analyzing actual accident data.

references.paper_title: The influence of vehicle front-end design on pedestrian ground impact
references.reason: This paper highlights the influence of vehicle design on pedestrian injuries, emphasizing the significance of considering pedestrian pre-collision poses in collision simulations and safety design.

references.paper_title: Realtime multi-person 2d pose estimation using part affinity fields
references.reason: This paper presents a seminal work in 2D human pose estimation, a key component of the proposed method in estimating pedestrian poses from video data.
